Test Name: Influenza Virus Type A, Type B, and RSV RNA, Molecular Detection, PCR
Specimen Type: Nasopharyngeal swab, throat swab, or other upper respiratory specimen
Purpose: To detect Influenza Virus Type A, Influenza Virus Type B, and Respiratory Syncytial Virus RNA using PCR for diagnostic purposes.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container with viral transport medium
Equipment: Real-Time PCR instrument and RNA extraction kit
